title: Himi 621
lyrics:
M.Kh.
1.
‘Oku ai si’a tangi he ‘ū fonua kotoa
Ki ha Taha mafi ke tokoni.
‘Oku kei fai ai pē ‘a e fakamo’ulaloa,
‘Oku kei mālohi pe ‘a e kovi.
Ko e tangi ē ‘a māmani,
“’Eiki! ‘Eiki! foki mei he langi!
Fuoloa ‘emau nofo, ‘o talitali atu;
‘Afe nai te Ke toe ha’u?”
2.
“ ‘Oku mau pōpula he ngaahi angahala,
Ma’u kii’i ‘e he Toko Taha Kov
i
.
‘O mau ‘auhia hifo he mate ta’engata,
Kae ‘ikai ha taha ke langom
i
.”
Ko e tangi ē, etc.
3.
“Hono ai si’a ‘ofa ki homau laumālie,
Pe ha huluhulu homau hala?
Mau mo’ui kui, ‘o tō ki heli ē,
Ka ko hai ha taha ‘e tokanga?”
Ko e tangi ē, etc.
4.
“’Oku lau ki ha Taha ne hifo mei he langi,
Ko e Fanautama ‘a Tangata:
‘O Ne pole tau mo e kovi ‘o māmani,
‘O Ne foki hake kuo lava.”
Ko e tangi ē, etc.
5.
“Kofa’ā hono lava, ka mau ka’anga ē,
‘O mau fāfā he poʻuli lahi?
Foki, Sīsū, mei langi, ‘o toe ala pē:
‘Oku vaivai ‘a e fai ‘a Ho Siasi.”
Ko e tangi ē, etc. *
